values: It has been a while since i last went for my run. 3 months? Or more than that? SO i decided to put on my running shoes and head for a run today. I must say that my stamina really dropped alot. Looking back at my own records, i used to be able to complete my 4.8km run, and today i only manage to complete 4.2km and i am totally out of breathe to complete the last 600m. 4.8km - 35.44 mins. Today 4.2 km - 38 mins.  I guess i will make a point to go for runs at least twice a week from now on.

Your animal sign is Ox

Your year name is Yi Chou 

The steady female Ox
Quiet, conservative, strong, unromantic, and unsentimental - that's our Ox lady. You have an iron will, a strong sense of responsibility, self-discipline and stout principles. In public, you come across as stoic and seriously determined to pull your weight. You are not the wildly passionate kind, nor are you fashionable or glamorous, though you may be chic and stylish in sensible dressing with a face devoid of make-up. Your charm lies in your strength and reliability. Often viewed as domineering by others, you think of it as being for their own good, though they may think otherwise. Flattery from others does nothing for you. Instead, you are more taken up with people who are trustworthy, prompt and steadfast. Your sense of humor is limited. You hate criticism even when you are wrong and can be extremely unforgiving when you are embarrassed in front of others. 

The wood female Ox.
Tough, strong, domineering, intelligent and capable, you are probably the most formidable of all Ox ladies. You are used to brushing aside your weaker companions and taking over the reins.

" TEN INTERPRETATIONS TO A HAPPIER LIFE"

1) Cry a river;build a bridge;get over it.
2) Everything happens in its own time.
3) You are the only person who can make yourself happy.
4) Laughter is the best tranquilizer with no side effects.
5) Happiness is a journey, not a destination
6) Do today what others won't so you can live tomorrow like others can't.
7) It is never too late to be what you might have become.
8) Treasure the love you recieved; it will surviv long after your gold and good health has vanished.
9) The journey of a thousanf miles starts with a single step
10)Always have something to do, something to love, and something to hope for.

Let go of past failures, sadness and ppl whom we remember but who no longer care for us. This sounds so easy but its easier said than done. We all have gone through our share of heartaches and sadness. But when we constantly remember the pain and sufferung we had endured, we are allowing htat sadess to gain an upper hand over us. What we must realize is that what happened has happened. Its over and done with. Ppl change and times change. Moving on in life is very difficult but its the first constructive step to a better you.

It has been a while since i blogged. Guess what, went blading on sunday and i fell down. My knees and my thigh gt bruised as well as bad scratches. I couldn't even walked properly. And just when my injuries are recovering, guess what? I FELL DOWN FROM THE STAIRS. My old injury bled again. How clumsy can i be right? I can't beleieve it either. I am just so down to luck recently.

Congrats to fang! She was awarded the EE Seng and Claire Lim Accountancy scholarship! She really derserve this award. She is a very hardworking girl who strive the best in what ever she do. She is leaving for her exchange program in Barcelona, Spain in an hours time. Wasn't able to send her off because i wasn't feeling too well. 

all the best girl...take care..see ya in dec...

had a really bad day today. Busy and stress with work. These few weeks are the auditing period. lots to touched up. 

Sometimes it keeps me pondering, am i in a wrong? Or i am just behaving the way i am. I wished i had a little more patience. But it wasn't easy when you started off with a bad day. everything just got so pissed off. 

is it so tough to say those words?

everybody changes from time to time...whether good or bad...its just a fact that we have to accept...

went to singapore flying club for dinner with kc on sun. it isn't a posh dining place. but wat matter is good food. The place is most famous for their Buffaloe chicken wings. The chicken wings has different level of spicyness. Starting from level 1 to level 16, if i did not rememeber wrongly. And the most spicy level is the chef challenge. Being a chilli lover, i decided to try level 5. Kc tried level 6 before n he advised me to try level 5. I was thinking is there a very big difference in terms of their spicyness. So i asked the waiter, and guess what did the waiter said. "Oh, i have never tried level 5 and 6 before, i tried level 8 and level 13~!!!" We were like, OK? Are you trying to tell us something?? haa. In any case, we ordered level 5. Initally when had my first bite, the spiceness was still alright. Taste alright to me and it wasn't as spicy as i tot. After i finished the first wing, i started feeling the burning sensation in my mouth. We ordered half a dozen and we could only finish 4 of it. For chilli lovers, you may wana try it.

bday parties are coming up, one after another....gonna be a busy week ahead...tennis with the usual kakhis tml...and i am gng to see the auditors are tml....wish me luck~!!

Your Five Factor Personality Profile
Extroversion: You have medium extroversion. You're not the life of the party, but you do show up for the party. Sometimes you are full of energy and open to new social experiences. But you also need to hibernate and enjoy your "down time." Conscientiousness: You have medium conscientiousness. You're generally good at balancing work and play. When you need to buckle down, you can usually get tasks done. But you've been known to goof off when you know you can get away with it. Agreeableness: You have low agreeableness. Your self interest comes first, and others come later, if at all. In general, you feel that people are not to be trusted. And you're skeptical that anyone else really feels differently. Neuroticism: You have medium neuroticism. You're generally cool and collected, but sometimes you do panic. Little worries or problems can consume you, draining your energy. Your life is pretty smooth, but there's a few emotional bumps you'd like to get rid of. Openness to experience: Your openness to new experiences is low. You're a pretty conservative person, and you favor what's socially acceptable. You think that change for novelty's sake is a very bad idea. While some may see this as boring, many see you as dependable and wise.
The Five Factor Personality Test

last week, i went for my first wakeboarding class~!!! It was fantastic. You guys should try it~! You will fall in love with this sport. Cool sport, with cool instructor. I guess i will be signing up for the course pretty soon. Any interested party?

a freaking tired day i had yest. Woke up 7am in the morning, went for a run. 

Distance: 3.15km 
Time: 23 mins

ok i know its pretty slow. But i guess its alright for my standard. After all i have not been running constantly. 

After the run, went home had a nice bathe, headed to sentosa. Met up with the guys at harbour front station. The moment we reached sentosa and after purchasing the tickets, the clouds started tearing. We still went ahead with the plan, went to the new food court for lunch and the sky became clear once we finished our lunch. Enjoyed the day with them. However, just don't understand why i just can't really click with this particular person. Last time, I did tried to strike a few conversation, but i just isn't comfortable. Can someone pls tell me why? haha. Not that i destest her, somehow or rather, just feel abit uncomfortable talking to her. Other than that everything was fine. Nice sun, my face was abit burnt. 

After sentosa, went mushroom spot for dinner. Bennie, yl, joined as well. Mushroom Spot is all about mushroom. 14 of us went there and 6 of us ordered a set meal. Its something like a steamboat. All the different kind of mushroom can be found there. A total of 20+ types of mushroom. hee.

After dinner, 8 of us went for a midnight movie. Pirates and the caribbean. Its a two an a half hours movie. I actually fell asleep twice. Not that the show is boring. I was just freaking tired.

What's my program for todaY? Probably a run later if my body isn't aching that much? Next week wakeboarding session, my dearest penguine bday celebration. Looking forward to it.~!!

What is the past like i say its the past. I am a person who only rememeber sweet memories and forget about the bad ones. 

But it can't be help that i thot of some memories and wondering if back than everything said and done was once true. However i have no intention to find out at all. Two possible outcomes : Extremely Disappointed vs not so disappointed. Get what i mean? So i always choose to just let go without probing much. Time is a healer. 

Girl, i do not know really know how to make you feel better because this really has to depend on yourself. But always rememeber i will always be there when you need me. That's what friends are for.

Its 2.44am mon morning and what am i still blogging??? 

The weather is soo fregging hot~! I have been tossing and turning on my bed since 12 am and i still couldn't get to sleep. And i still gt work tml~! Can't singapore just snow for once~!!! 

met up with di and her bf (qi aka chicken little) for a quick catch up session today. You guys must be wondering why i call qi chicken little. If you guys see him, you will know why. lol. Apparently he wore a pair of specs which i think its too small for his face. I din say its ugly, its just looks too cute. No offence..And that pair of specs was chosen by my dearest di. hee..

i met lin on my way home and she was running some last min errands before leaving for her bangkok trip. Since i've gt nth to do even if i got home, i accompanied her. Went to the library and borrowed some magazines. I must say it had been donkey years since i last stepped into the library. 

Talking about bangkok, i just came back from bK last week. I must say that it is really fun. SHOPPING SPREE.!! food, shoes, heels, clothes and accessories are fregging cheap there. And the food there are not bad either. If you guys ever go there, you have to try the gultinous rice with mango. Its NICE!~ Have you guys tried squeezing eight ppl in a cab?? If we were to do that in singapore, i guess we will be fine. And guess what, we did that. Eight of us went, eight of us squeeze into a cab. What's even more surprising is that those "toot toot", those three wheels vehicle? We actually saw six MAN squeezing into one *toot toot*. Its pretty amazing that the vehicle could take the weight of six MAN exculding the driver. 

Shall post up the pics once i got hold of it.

the imbalance mood is getting from bad to worse. how should i help myself? i should just take things at stride. Will i be able to do it?? Its easier said than done. 

nv in my life i have felt like that b4...is there a prob with me???

its kinda scary. no idea if its with me or its with that person. Sometimes, ladies instinct is very accurate. But seriously i hope this time my instinct is wrong. Its nothing of that sort... Even if its true, Don't want to go thru it again. Its just too hard tough, a mentally tortured "game" to experience. 

I am happy with the way i am, the lifestyle i am in. No plans to change.

time really heals, though not completely, at least 80%. Learn to take things at stride. Life will than be much wonderful and not as bad as it seems. 

Will be off to bangkok real soon...in a couple of weeks...tc peeps...

flipping through my photo albums brings me back to happy memories that i had with my friends. The smiles, the laughter, the fun that we had. Its just memories that will happen once in a life time. Its just wonderful memories that i will never forget..

Learn to deal with problems, emotions, whatever obstacles that comes in my way. Not that everytime when you need someone, the someone will be there. Everything and everyone in this world is constantly changing.

Sometimes i wish i could really have control over it. I tot i could, and i tot i was doing very well in handling it. Apparently, i realised that perhaps i wasn't handling as well as i tot. There is just something inside of me that i can't deal with. I am not able to handle. To come out of this shit means that i have to come in terms with it. Comes in terms with this shit means i have to accept whatever the outcome is, though i already know what will the outcome since last year. 

**** UP ~~!!!!

had a really fun, challenging and fufiling day. Spend one whole day at ubin. Cycled the whole ubin and we actually climbed up the cliff and had a very nice view of one of the quarry there. Shall post up pics. After the ubin trip, we went to old changi hospital. Nth much happened just that we heard a bit of noise at an area. I guess because we went there quite early, tt's why we did not experience anything. But seriously, i rather nt want to see or experience anything from there. Haha..My friend told me they went there once and just before they left, they actually sense heavy breathing. They quickly left the place and sped off in their car, forgetting to even switch on their headlights. eeerrrieee... Actually i am quite down on luck. That's why i hestiated to visit the old changi hospital. Firstly i broke my mirror. And it was believed that when one broke a mirror, bad lucks falls on tt person. Don't know if its true. At ubin, i gt abit burnt by my friend's cigar butt. I went over to his side to take a look at the pics we took, and ya, i gt burnt. After that, my sandals strap broke. At first, it was only one side of the strap that came off. But when i climb down from the cliff, and got onto my bike, the other die of the strap came off as well. How wonderful life can be. lol Some picss below... Ubin, nt much changes the view from the cliff that we climbed to....after encountering much obstacles.. one of the houses there meteor rain...where is the other two guys?? the guys... elvin, ivan, allan jerry, kL and who is that at the side??? Jasssssss
i lost myself when i came home. uncontrollably lost control of myself.

i finally got my arse up from bed and went for a run. THanks to mr JJ. I would still be snoring away if he had not called me. lOl. I wasn't as enthu as before. as i was starting my run,i was deciding on which route to take. To simei or to the park. I usually would take the route to simei without hesitation? Apparently, today, i hesitated and i took the park instead. I don't really like to take the park because the distance is very short as compared to the route to simei. And i have to run rounds to cover the distance that i take to simei. And i just don't get the sense of satisfaction after the run from the park. It is expected that my stamina has drop temendously, and i really mean it. I felt like a heavy toad when i was running. I ran for like only 400m, i was like panting so badly. And my whole run slows down. Though i ran for like 20 mins. I can be very sure tt the distance covered is nt even more than 2.4 km. Tt's bad isn't it? I felt that i haven done enough, when i went back home, i climbed the stairs to the 11th storey and climb back to the 2nd storey. LOL

In any case, i felt a little accomplished, after all, for the past pathetic 2 mths i have not done any excercise at all. 

Met up with the dummies yest. lol. The dove and the duck. Wanted to chill out at indochine. Apparently when we reached the place, all seats were reserved and taken. INstead we went to windows on club street (no idea if this is the correct name of the restaurant) haha. Sat there for like close to two hours, do some catching up. Talked about some eeerrie stuffs and as usual, crapping S~!away. 

LIFE IS JUST SO WoNDerFUL~!!

went settlers at clarke quay with rh, jj, anna, ryan and jj's friend. It was quite a nice place. Ambience was alright. Definitely a place to de-stress but not a good place for chilling out. The ambience isn't for chilling out because everyone there are playing games and you could imagine how loud people can get if they are excited over certain games, like "PIT". haha. 

When i was on my way home yest, mr JJ said tt i had became fairer~!!!!. Is that really true??? Actually come to think of it if i were to put on weight, I deserved it. I did not excerise for months. Where have all my determination gone to? Yesterday, during my journey home, i passed by the route which i used to run and at that point in time, i was so determine that i would head for a run after i reached home. And guess wat, my dad ask me to join them for dinner. Where have my determination gone to??? I will find it back.!


Learn to live life happily. Life is short. Learn to take things at stride. Just do what you want to do and don't regret.
Know that there are many possible outcomes for any given condition, even for those that may seem impossible to overcome.
